body:
Comment 2: 
I remembered that we have a pass replacing middle dot into '.'.
OK, it's CL 72280043, but that only handles ELF and Mach-O,
but it could serve as a reference.

Alex, as you can reproduce this, feel free to incorporate code
into cmd/ld/pe.c to see if it fixes it.
_Labels changed: added **release-go1.3maybe**, **repo-main**, **gdb**._
